content: In @Grahame Grieve 's blog post about Active Questionnaires, there is discussion of a "liquid format" in which Expressions of type "application/x-fhir-query" can have embedded FHIRPath expressions enclosed in double-braces. Did this make it into some of version of the spec? I could not find it even in a tracker item. Was a decision made to drop it?
It should be documented in SDC, but might not have been. Can you submit a change request?
